message: Let's be fair, Bob. This gives us a good starting point.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more balanced split.  It's important we reach an agreement soon.
Bob, I understand you want a balanced split, but time is money! This offer ensures we both benefit. Let's close this deal.
Alice, this offer is a good compromise considering the time pressure and the fact that inflation affects you more than me. Let's be rational and finalize this.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this back and forth is costing us both.  This is my final offer.
Alice, this is a fair 50/50 split. There's no point dragging this out any further as inflation is hurting us both.  Let's end this now.
